name: ailang
description: AILANG tools for AI code synthesis

tools.name: ailang_check
tools.description: Type-check an AILANG file without running it. Returns any type errors found.

file.description: Path to the .ail file to check

tools.name: ailang_run
tools.description: Run an AILANG program with specified capabilities.

file.description: Path to the .ail file to run

tools.name: ailang_prompt
tools.description: Get the AILANG teaching prompt with current syntax rules and templates. ALWAYS call this before writing AILANG code.

tools.name: ailang_builtins
tools.description: List AILANG builtin functions, optionally filtered by search term.

search.description: Optional search term to filter builtins

tools.name: ailang_repl_eval
tools.description: Evaluate a single expression in the AILANG REPL context.
